entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 19.
